name: hmmer

conflicts.name: arch=None-None-aarch64:
conflicts.description: hmmer: hmmer is only available for x86_64 and PowerPC

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
HMMER is used for searching sequence databases for sequence homologs,
and for making sequence alignments. It implements methods using
probabilistic models called profile hidden Markov models (profile HMMs).

dependencies.name: gsl
dependencies.description:
The GNU Scientific Library (GSL) is a numerical library for C and C++
programmers. It is free software under the GNU General Public License.
The library provides a wide range of mathematical routines such as
random number generators, special functions and least-squares fitting.
There are over 1000 functions in total with an extensive test suite.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description: Cray/HPE packaging of MVAPICH2 for HPE Apollo systems

dependent_to.name: py-alphafold
dependent_to.description:
AlphaFold is an AI system developed by DeepMind that predicts a
protein's 3D structure from its amino acid sequence. It regularly
achieves accuracy competitive with experiment.

dependent_to.name: repeatmasker
dependent_to.description:
RepeatMasker is a program that screens DNA sequences for interspersed
repeats and low complexity DNA sequences.

dependent_to.name: itsx
dependent_to.description:
Improved software detection and extraction of ITS1 and ITS2 from
ribosomal ITS sequences of fungi and other eukaryotes for use in
environmental sequencing

dependent_to.name: trinotate
dependent_to.description:
Trinotate is a comprehensive annotation suite designed for automatic
functional annotation of transcriptomes, particularly de novo assembled
transcriptomes, from model or non-model organisms

dependent_to.name: vifi
dependent_to.description:
ViFi is a collection of python and perl scripts for identifying viral
integration and fusion mRNA reads from NGS data.

dependent_to.name: prokka
dependent_to.description:
Prokka is a software tool to annotate bacterial, archaeal and viral
genomes quickly and produce standards-compliant output files.

dependent_to.name: py-pipits
dependent_to.description: Automated pipeline for analyses of fungal ITS from the Illumina

dependent_to.name: py-bakta
dependent_to.description:
Bakta: rapid & standardized annotation of bacterial genomes, MAGs &
plasmids

dependent_to.name: busco
dependent_to.description:
Assesses genome assembly and annotation completeness with Benchmarking
Universal Single-Copy Orthologs

dependent_to.name: isescan
dependent_to.description:
A python pipeline to identify IS (Insertion Sequence) elements in genome
and metagenome

dependent_to.name: py-tesorter
dependent_to.description:
TEsorter is coded for LTR_retriever to classify long terminal repeat
retrotransposons (LTR-RTs) at first. It can also be used to classify any
other transposable elements (TEs), including Class I and Class II
elements which are covered by the REXdb database.

dependent_to.name: barrnap
dependent_to.description: Barrnap predicts the location of ribosomal RNA genes in genomes.

dependent_to.name: orthofiller
dependent_to.description:
OrthoFiller: Identifying missing annotations for evolutionarily
conserved genes.

dependent_to.name: ltr-retriever
dependent_to.description:
LTR_retriever is a highly accurate and sensitive program for
identification of LTR retrotransposons.

dependent_to.name: py-gtdbtk
dependent_to.description:
GTDB-Tk is a software toolkit for assigning objective taxonomic
classifications to bacterial and archaeal genomes based on the Genome
Database Taxonomy (GTDB).

dependent_to.name: py-checkm-genome
dependent_to.description:
Assess the quality of microbial genomes recovered from isolates, single
cells, and metagenomes

dependent_to.name: amrfinder
dependent_to.description:
NCBI AMRFinderPlus: This software and the accompanying database identify
acquired antimicrobial resistance genes in bacterial protein and/or
assembled nucleotide sequences as well as known resistance-associated
point mutations for several taxa. With AMRFinderPlus we added select
members of additional classes of genes such as virulence factors,
biocide, heat, acid, and metal resistance genes.
